name: Heart (TotallyPorff)
description:
Heart is a short emotional game in which you attempt to repair a heart by choosing the right words to say. It was made in two days for the Global Game Jam of 2020.

Global Game Jam 2020: https://globalgamejam.org/2020/games/heart-0
